name: Little Maze
description:
Little Maze

Little Maze is a horror game about an Agent trapped in a maze. On the way to an escape, the Agent can pick up valuable coins. But be aware, heading deeper into the maze is not a risk to be taken lightly.

⚠️ The web-version has lag spikes when entering new sections ⚠️
Download the .exe for a smoother experience.

Developer comments
  • I wanted to add music and sound effects, but I'm no musician and with the size limitations (of the 4MB Game Jam) I couldn't find any existing works that fit.
  • I also wanted add some system for help in navigation. A minimap with unlockable sections, or a waypoint system, or something. But I ran out of time before starting on anything like that.

I hope you can enjoy the game without these features.
